title: Chou Futsuu Toshi Kashiwa Densetsu: Ekimae Housou UDC2-hen
original_name: 【駅前放送 UDC2 編】超普通都市カシワ伝説
sinopse: Original videos featuring the cast of Chou Futsuu Toshi Kashiwa Densetsu that are supported by the Kashiwa Urban Design Center (UDC2). They are set at Kashiwa Station and are both released online and broadcast at the station.
